trans-unit.source: Represents a geographical location that is determined by latitude and longitude coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma localização geográfica, que é determinada pelo latitude e longitude coordenadas.

trans-unit.source: May also include altitude, accuracy, speed, and course information.
trans-unit.target: Também pode incluir altitude, exatidão, velocidade e informações de decorrer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> that has no data fields set.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> que não tem dados campos definido.

trans-unit.source: All data fields are set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os campos de dados estão definidos como <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: The new instance of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> is equivalent to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: A nova instância do <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>é equivalente ao <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: This constructor should be used for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor deve ser utilizado para a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> class from latitude and longitude data.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> classe a partir de dados de latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: The latitude and longitude values must correspond to an actual location on the globe.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de latitude e longitude tem de corresponder a uma localização no mundo real.

trans-unit.source: The latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: A latitude da localização.

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: Podem variar entre-90.0 e 90.0.

trans-unit.source: The longitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: A longitude da localização.

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0.
trans-unit.target: Podem variar entre-180.0 e 180.0.

trans-unit.source: Latitude or longitude is out of range.
trans-unit.target: A latitude ou longitude está fora do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> class from latitude, longitude, and altitude data.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> classe a partir dos dados altitude, latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: The latitude and longitude values must correspond to an actual location on the globe.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de latitude e longitude tem de corresponder a uma localização no mundo real.

trans-unit.source: Latitude.
trans-unit.target: Latitude.

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: Podem variar entre-90.0 e 90.0.

trans-unit.source: Longitude.
trans-unit.target: Longitude.

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0
trans-unit.target: Podem variar entre-180.0 e 180.0

trans-unit.source: The altitude in meters.
trans-unit.target: Altitude em medidores.

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <xref:System.Double>, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser negativo, 0, positivo, ou <xref:System.Double>, se desconhecido.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: latitude, longitude, or altitude is out of range.
trans-unit.target: latitude, longitude, ou altitude está fora do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> class from latitude, longitude, altitude, horizontal accuracy, vertical accuracy, speed, and course.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> classe a partir de latitude, longitude, altitude, exatidão horizontal, exatidão vertical, velocidade e decorrer.

trans-unit.source: The latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: A latitude da localização.

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: Podem variar entre-90.0 e 90.0.

trans-unit.source: The longitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: A longitude da localização.

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0.
trans-unit.target: Podem variar entre-180.0 e 180.0.

trans-unit.source: The altitude in meters.
trans-unit.target: Altitude em medidores.

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <xref:System.Double>, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser negativo, 0, positivo, ou <xref:System.Double>, se desconhecido.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the latitude and longitude coordinates, in meters.
trans-unit.target: A precisão das coordenadas de latitude e longitude, na medidores.

trans-unit.source: Must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Tem de ser maior que ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: If a value of 0 is supplied to this constructor, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy*> property will be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Se for fornecido um valor de 0 a este construtor, a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy*>propriedade será definida para <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy*>

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: A precisão do altitude, em medidores.

trans-unit.source: Must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Tem de ser maior que ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: If a value of 0 is supplied to this constructor, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy*> property will be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Se for fornecido um valor de 0 a este construtor, a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy*>propriedade será definida para <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy*>

trans-unit.source: The speed measured in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: A velocidade da medida em medidores por segundo.

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <xref:System.Double>, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser negativo, 0, positivo, ou <xref:System.Double>, se desconhecido.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: A negative speed can indicate moving in reverse.
trans-unit.target: Uma velocidade negativa pode indicar mover no inversa.

trans-unit.source: The direction of travel, rather than orientation.
trans-unit.target: A direção do levar, em vez de orientação.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is measured in degrees relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro é medido em graus relativo norte verdadeiro.

trans-unit.source: Must range from 0 to 360.0, or be <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Tem de estar no intervalo de 0 a 360.0 ou ser <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: latitude, longitude, horizontalAccuracy, verticalAccuracy, or course is out of range.
trans-unit.target: latitude, longitude, horizontalAccuracy, verticalAccuracy, or course is out of range.

trans-unit.source: Gets the altitude of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o altitude do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>, em medidores.

trans-unit.source: The altitude is given relative to sea level.
trans-unit.target: O altitude é dado em relação ao nível de sea.

trans-unit.source: The altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: O altitude em medidores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the heading in degrees, relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o cabeçalho em graus, relativo à norte verdadeiro.

trans-unit.source: The valid range includes values from 0.0 to 360.0, and `Double.NaN` if the heading is not defined.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo válido inclui valores entre 0,0 e 360.0, e `Double.NaN` não está definido no cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: The heading in degrees, relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: O cabeçalho em graus, relativo à norte verdadeiro.

trans-unit.source: Course is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: Decorrer está definida fora do intervalo válido.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> object is equivalent to the parameter, based solely on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> objeto é equivalente ao parâmetro, baseado unicamente em latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>objetos têm o mesmo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>Propriedades não são utilizadas para determinar equivalência.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> object to compare to the calling object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> objeto comparar ao objeto de chamada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> objetos são igual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if a specified <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>, based solely on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma determinada <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> é igual a atual <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>, com base exclusivamente com a latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>objetos têm o mesmo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>Propriedades não são utilizadas para determinar equivalência.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto comparar o <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> para.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise,<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se o <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> objetos são igual; caso contrário,<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the distance between the latitude and longitude coordinates that are specified by this <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> and another specified <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a distância entre as coordenadas de latitude e longitude especificados por este <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> e outra especificado <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Haversine formula is used to calculate the distance.
trans-unit.target: A fórmula Haversine é utilizada para calcular a distância.

trans-unit.source: The Haversine formula accounts for the curvature of the earth, but assumes a spherical earth rather than an ellipsoid.
trans-unit.target: A fórmula Haversine contas para curvature terrestre, mas presume um earth spherical em vez de um ellipsoid.

trans-unit.source: For long distances, the Haversine formula introduces an error of less than 0.1 percent.
trans-unit.target: Para distâncias longas, a fórmula Haversine apresenta um erro de menor 0.1 por cento.

trans-unit.source: Altitude is not used to calculate the distance.
trans-unit.target: Altitude não é utilizado para calcular a distância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> for the location to calculate the distance to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> para a localização calcular a distância à.

trans-unit.source: The distance between the two coordinates, in meters.
trans-unit.target: A distância entre duas coordenadas, em medidores.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Funciona como uma função de hash para o <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects that are equivalent have the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>objetos equivalentes têm o mesmo código hash.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>objetos têm o mesmo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>Propriedades não são utilizadas para determinar equivalência.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para o atual <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accuracy of the latitude and longitude that is given by the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a precisão da latitude e longitude que é fornecido pelo <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>, em medidores.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy can be considered the radius of certainty of the latitude and longitude data.
trans-unit.target: A precisão pode ser considerada raio da certainty dos dados de latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: A circular area that is formed with the accuracy as the radius and the latitude and longitude coordinates as the center contains the actual location.
trans-unit.target: Uma área circular que está formada com a precisão como as coordenadas de radius e a latitude e longitude como o System center contém a localização real.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the latitude and longitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: A precisão da latitude e longitude, em medidores.

trans-unit.source: HorizontalAccuracy is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: HorizontalAccuracy está definida fora do intervalo válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> does not contain latitude or longitude data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> não contém dados de latitude ou longitude.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> that does not contain latitude or longitude data is equal to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>que não contém latitude ou dados de longitude são igual ao <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> does not contain latitude or longitude data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> não contém dados de latitude ou longitude; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the latitude of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a latitude do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Latitude can range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: A latitude pode variar entre-90.0 para 90.0.

trans-unit.source: Latitude is measured in degrees north or south from the equator.
trans-unit.target: A latitude é medida em graus, Norte Sul de Equador ou o limite de tempo.

trans-unit.source: Positive values are north of the equator and negative values are south of the equator.
trans-unit.target: Valores positivos são north of Equador e valores negativos são equidistantes do Equador.

trans-unit.source: Latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: Latitude da localização.

trans-unit.source: Latitude is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: A latitude está definida fora do intervalo válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the longitude of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a longitude do <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The longitude can range from -180.0 to 180.0.
trans-unit.target: A longitude pode variar entre-180.0 para 180.0.

trans-unit.source: Longitude is measured in degrees east or west of the prime meridian.
trans-unit.target: A longitude é medida em graus Leste ou oeste do meridiano prime.

trans-unit.source: Negative values are west of the prime meridian, and positive values are east of the prime meridian.
trans-unit.target: Os valores negativos são oeste do meridiano prime e valores positivos são east of o meridiano prime.

trans-unit.source: The longitude.
trans-unit.target: A longitude.

trans-unit.source: Longitude is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: A longitude está definida fora do intervalo válido.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects refer to the same location.
trans-unit.target: Determina se dois <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> Consulte objetos na mesma localização.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>objetos têm o mesmo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>Propriedades não são utilizadas para determinar equivalência.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects are determined to be equivalent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se o <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> são determinados objetos como equivalentes; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects correspond to different locations.
trans-unit.target: Determina se dois <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> objetos correspondem a localizações diferentes.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>objetos têm o mesmo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>Propriedades não são utilizadas para determinar equivalência.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects are determined to be different; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se o <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> objetos são determinados para ser diferente; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speed in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a velocidade em medidores por segundo.

trans-unit.source: The speed in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: A velocidade do medidores por segundo.

trans-unit.source: The speed must be greater than or equal to zero, or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: A velocidade tem de ser maior que ou igual a zero ou <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Speed is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: Velocidade está definida fora do intervalo válido.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que contém a latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: The string representation returned by this method is intended only for debugging use.
trans-unit.target: A representação de cadeia devolvida por este método destina-se apenas para utilização de depuração.

trans-unit.source: This method does not return any locale-specific formatting for latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Este método não devolveu qualquer região específica de formatação de latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the latitude and longitude, separated by a comma.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém a latitude e longitude, separados por vírgulas.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> object that has unknown latitude and longitude fields.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> objeto com desconhecido campos de latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.IsUnknown%2A> property can be used to verify whether a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> contains no data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.IsUnknown%2A>propriedade pode ser utilizada para verificar se um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>não contém dados.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.IsUnknown%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accuracy of the altitude given by the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a precisão do altitude fornecida o <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>, em medidores.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: A precisão do altitude, em medidores.

trans-unit.source: VerticalAccuracy is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: VerticalAccuracy está definida fora do intervalo válido.
